As such, all on-site and set appointments will be suspended until the end of the semester, if not longer.  Please know that all financial aid counseling staff is working remotely to support all student needs. Your counselor is assigned by college, and their contact information during this time is listed below. The best manner to reach your counselor during this time is via email.  We appreciate all of your patience during this extraordinary time, and intend to provide continued support to all of our students while maintaining continuity in all financial aid process.
